column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I was on the hunt for the best steakhouse in Chicago for my boyfriend's birthday dinner. This place is definitely it!! Myself being a vegan
column2: it is very difficult to find a steakhouse that has any options (I just ask for one salad!!). I was very happy to see they offer a vegetarian menu that includes items that can be veganized. Our waitress (I forgot her name) was AMAZING and so accommodating. On top of that
column3: my boyfriend said it was the best steak he's ever had (he got the dry aged rib eye). Atmosphere and drinks were *chef's kiss*. I would definitely come back here again
